sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>spirit</radical> loses its <radical>skin</radical> as a part of the damages it <kanji>incur</kanji>s after death.
meaningInfo: Some spirits get mad when they lose their skin, and this makes them incur their wrath on the living humans that still have skin.
readingMnemonic: When you <kanji>incur</kanji> the wrath of an angry spirit, you'll feel your skin <reading>hea</reading>t (<ja>ひ</ja>) up.
readingInfo: It feels like your skin is cooking! You're turning red. The spirit is trying to incur the same type of skin damage it had done to it by super-heating your skin! Oww owww!
